Posts.EditableText:
I was halfway through enjoying an adventure when a messge popped up saying the session has ended, what does this mean?
My internet was still up.
Posts.HTML:
I was halfway through enjoying an adventure when a messge popped up saying the session has ended, what does this mean?
My internet was still up.

Posts.EditableText: If You press nothing for a short while when playing online ( IE call of nature)  the game will close down . You must re enter it, or download it to prevent this.
Posts.HTML: If You press nothing for a short while when playing online ( IE call of nature) the game will close down . You must re enter it, or download it to prevent this.
